workshoptitle: Deploy Hyperion on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Getting Started on OCI
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Preparing Prerequisites for Hyperion on OCI
Lab 2: Provisioning Infrastructure for HFM on OCI
Lab 3: Setting up Hyperion VM Instances
Lab 4 (optional): Setting up a Shared Disk Drive
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Template to link to Need Help lab at the end of workshop. Change 'CHANGE-ME' in link below to need-help-livelabs.md or need-help-freetier.md
